notifications.title: Redis 8.0-M04 is now available – the fastest Redis ever
notifications.body:
The fourth milestone of Redis 8 is our most advanced and high-performance offering yet, now available in the Community Edition (CE) for you to try.

It brings new hash commands, performance improvements, and memory defragmentation improvements.

Get it from Docker Hub.

notifications.title: Connect to Redis from Visual Studio Code
notifications.body:
Redis for VS Code brings the power of Redis directly into your favorite code editor!

Connect to your Redis databases from within Microsoft Visual Studio Code and enjoy the streamlined experience you already love in Redis Insight.

Download Redis for VS Code from Visual Studio Marketplace.

notifications.title: Security Advisory: CVE-2024-31449, CVE-2024-31227, CVE-2024-31228
notifications.body:
Recently, three Redis security vulnerabilities were found. If you’re using Redis Cloud, no action is needed as it’s already updated. For self-managed Redis (Software or Community versions), please upgrade promptly.

Learn more in our blog post on how to protect your instance.
